Since, as far as I know SeaMonkey was the only consumer of the optional/ installer support, and Bug 666518 removed the need for this from SeaMonkey, removing this dead code from m-c build system/installer will help to simplify these code paths a bit.

And given the inherent complexity here, it has a higher win than most dead-code-removals.

(:rs if I am wrong and other apps, projects, etc. use this that you know of, we can WONTFIX this)
